solution_line_template: The number of chairs that are disposed of after they're found to be damaged is {damaged_chair_percentage}*{total_chairs} = <<{damaged_chair_percentage}*{total_chairs}={disposed_chairs}>>{disposed_chairs}.
The number of chairs in good condition in Kenzo's company is {total_chairs}-{disposed_chairs} = <<{total_chairs}-{disposed_chairs}={remaining_chairs}>>{remaining_chairs}
The round tables also have {total_tables}*{legs_per_table} = <<{total_tables}*{legs_per_table}={table_legs}>>{table_legs} legs.
In total, the furniture in Kenzo's company has {table_legs}+{remaining_chair_legs} = <<{table_legs}+{remaining_chair_legs}={total_legs}>>{total_legs} legs.
